props.activator: Designate a custom activator when the `activator` slot is not used. String can be any valid querySelector and Object can be any valid Node.
props.disabled: Disables the ability to open the component.
props.openOnClick: Designates whether component should activate when its activator is clicked.
props.openOnHover: Designates whether component should activate when its activator is hovered.
props.internalActivator: Detaches the menu content inside of the component as opposed to the document.
